main event: An Aloha Airlines flight reported seeing an unidentified flying object over the island of Hawaii.
interesting points: The object was sighted for approximately 15 minutes.
The object appeared to have red and blue running lights.
For a short period of time, the object appeared to travel at a 'terrific rate of speed'.
The object was sighted above 10,000 feet in altitude.
The sighting was reported to the Air Force per Form 1392 #176.
sighted object: One unidentified flying object with red and blue running lights
